CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1946, pg. 26 reads: "Water Belle - Charming Lois Weaver is one of the many attractive girls who will be seen in gigantic 'Water Circus' at Ammon Center on the night of Aug. 9. The big show will be one of the features of Frog Week, and special provisions are being made to handle a record-breaking crowd. - Harris photo."Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 3, 1946, pg. 26, read: "participants in the colorful Water Circus at Ammon Center pool Friday, Aug. 9.  The Circus will be one of the feature events of Frogs Week Celebration.  The spectacular show will include all types of stunts, ballet dancing and thrilling diving.  The Bureau of Recreation is joining with the Frogs in sponsoring the Circus which promises to be as sensational as anything of its kind ever presented here."
TitMainTitle: Lois Weaver [Watson] wearing one piece bathing suit with floral front and dark back, posed on diving board of Ammon recreation center swimming pool
